changeSet.author: doncoffee
changeSet.sql: create table `confectionery-store`.supplier ( store_id int auto_increment primary key, contactPerson varchar(255) null, name varchar(255) null, address_id int null, phone_number_id int null, constraint FK5crfmc9tl15gc3lekojuewrje foreign key (phone_number_id) references `confectionery-store`.phone_number (phone_number_id), constraint FK95a8oipih48obtbhltjy7hgvb foreign key (address_id) references `confectionery-store`.address (address_id) );
